law.text: [ Text of section effective until June 19, 2012. For text effective June 19, 2012, see below.] The connector seal of approval shall be assigned to health benefit plans that the board determines (1) meets the requirements of subsection (d) of section 5; (2) provides good value to consumer; (3) offers high quality; and (4) is offered through the connector. Chapter 176Q: Seal of approval [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 118, Sec. 48 effective June 19, 2012. For text effective until June 19, 2012, see above.] The connector seal of approval shall be assigned to health benefit plans or stand-alone vision or stand-alone dental plans, as applicable, that the board determines: (i) meet the requirements of subsection (d) of section 5; (ii) provide good value to consumer; (iii) offer high quality; and (iv) are offered through the connector.
